resources.string: You must read and accept the privacy policies, terms and conditions to continue.
Sending suggestions will help us to add more content for you to enjoy. Thanks for your collaboration
With the bug report we will make an effective application, Thanks for your collaboration
Lo-fi RADIO has been turned off
Enter the minutes for Lo-fi RADIO to stop.
Login will only be done by Google, Lo-fi RADIO does not have access to your data or password, the account will only be used for data storage (Favorites).
I have read the security policy terms and accept conditions

Lofer - Lofi RADIO is an application developed by a single person, the project has started since October 2018 as a way to publicize "Lofi" music and different categories as a music platform to discover and support independent artists, as I love this kind of music. 
 This application is still in development. 

 - About me 

 I am a student in software development and I love this, since I have done it with love for people with the same music tastes, I am 19 years old and it is better to improve every day This application, since I do not have external help for the development of this, for this reason, the collaboration in sending suggestions and error reports is very important for me and I thank you from the heart for the collaboration as well as those people who donate to continue with the development. 
 - @luisguzmanms

There is a new version available, the installation is necessary for the correct operation of the application. 


 NOTE: Please note that in some cases you must grant the permissions to download the file and to install it.

Let me recommend this app and enjoy the best music Lofi, Chill, Anime, Vaporwave, Sad. 
 Totally Free!
